mainText:
Steve Jobs was, is, and always will be my idol. I grew up with apple 
products, and finally worked until I could afford a MacBook Pro. I 
always look forward to see him present or introduce a product. Thank 
you, Mr. Jobs. I may only be thirteen, but I know a great man when I see 
one. I am sorry, Mrs. Jobs for the loss of your husband. I wish I got to 
meet him. Thank you, Mr. Jobs for "A"s on my projects. Thank you for 
inspiring me to be a great person. Mr. Jobs' death is a terrible event. 
The world will miss you, Steve Jobs.
header: The Greatest Man to Ever Live
author: Connor
